channel.title: Lubridate on Hugo Toscano
channel.description: Recent content in Lubridate on Hugo Toscano

item.title: Euro vs Dollar: Working with Lubridate and some other packages
item.description: Welcome to this new post about the Euro versus Dollar historical exchange rate since 1999 to the present day. This post will deal with dates, so I will use mainly the lubridate package and some of its most important functions. I will do my best to show you the power and simplicity of this truly magnificent tool within the R universe. Nevertheless, I wonâ€™t be restricted only to lubridate and will use some other packages to deal with this type of data.
